description:
The "nova lock" and "nova unlock" commands will enable OpenStack's answer to EC2's "termination protection" functionality, which some users find handy, but the lock-state of an instance is not presented anywhere in the API.

This causes confusion and panic when users to attempt actions on locked instances, and the actions fail for no discernible reason.
title: Instance lock/unlock state is not presented anywhere
